casebody.data:
Jacob L. WYNNE
v.
The KANSAS CITY SOUTHERN RAILWAY COMPANY NO. 2018-CC-677 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 21, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, SECOND CIRCUIT, PARISH OF CADDO PER CURIAM

Granted. We find the court of appeal erred in exercising its supervisory jurisdiction to review the partial summary judgment, as the requirements of Herlitz Const. Co. v. Hotel Investors , 396 So.2d 878 (La. 1981), are not satisfied. Accordingly, the judgment of the court of appeal is vacated and set aside, and the case is remanded to the district court for further proceedings.

Hughes, J., would deny the writ.

GENOVESE, J., would deny.
